Ocean Life.name: Fin-tastic Fish Facts
Ocean Life.description: Dive into the world of ichthyology with this quiz! Test your knowledge of fish, tides, and the ocean's bounty. From identifying different species to understanding marine terminology, this quiz will challenge your understanding of the underwater realm.

questions.text: What is the technical term for someone who studies fish?
questions.hint: The root of this word comes from the Greek for fish, ‘ichthys.’

questions.text: What term is used to describe a group of fish?
questions.hint: This term also applies to a place of learning, reflecting their coordinated movement.

questions.text: On average, what length of time passes between high tides?
questions.hint: This interval is influenced by the lunar cycle, occurring roughly twice a day.

questions.text: Which of these foods could you catch at sea?
questions.hint: This food is a shellfish, often harvested from ocean waters.

questions.text: Which of these is a fish?
questions.hint: This creature, despite its name, is a true fish with a unique, horse-like appearance.

Ocean Life.name: Ocean's Edge: A Marine Mishap
Ocean Life.description: Explore the impact of environmental disasters and test your knowledge of marine life. This quiz combines questions about fish identification with a look at a significant ecological event. Can you navigate the waters of knowledge?

questions.text: Which of these is a fish?
questions.hint: This creature, despite its name, is a true fish with a unique, horse-like appearance.

questions.text: Which of these foods could you catch at sea?
questions.hint: This food is a shellfish, often harvested from ocean waters.

questions.text: Where did the Exxon Valdez run aground in March of 1989?
questions.hint: This Alaskan location is named after a British royal and known for its pristine waters.
